summary:
Comcast, based in Philadelphia, is a huge company that provides cable TV, internet, and phone services to millions of people in the U.S. It's one of the biggest media and telecommunications companies globally. Comcast owns NBCUniversal, which means they also make movies, TV shows, and run theme parks. They offer services in 40 states and D.C.

However, Comcast has faced criticism for poor customer service, not following net neutrality rules, and not having enough competition in their service areas. Some people think they use their power to control internet speeds unfairly.
title: Comcast
